translation: 随他们悲伤去吧。

original: So, we lose some readiness.
translation: 所以，我们还没准备好。

original: Missed Recruiting Target
translation: 兵源流失

original: The rapid expansion of our ports and docks has led to more young men leaving the farms and finding work on ships for trading companies. It's getting harder to find men we can count on to march to war.
translation: 我们码头，港口的急速扩张使得越来越多的年轻人离开农村去贸易公司的船上寻找工作。如今很难招募到可靠的战士。

original: May the sea consume them.
translation: 愿海洋吞噬他们。

original: Rotting Wood
translation: 木材腐烂

original: Our voyages into strange waters with ill-prepared ships mean that the wood is decaying faster than expected. Humidity, rot, termites... there is a price for finding new markets.
translation: 我们以未做万全准备的船只驶向陌生海域使得木材比预想的更快腐烂。湿气，腐烂，白蚁……开拓新的市场需要代价。

original: Fix it where you can.
translation: 尽你们的所能去解决它。

original: Stick to the normal schedule.
translation: 坚持原计划。

original: Shipyard Fire
translation: 造船厂大火

original: It was only a matter of time before the dangerous mix of tar, wood and gunpowder would lead to a fire at a major port. It will take some time to get production back up to normal levels.
translation: 焦油，木料，火药的危险混合物引起主要港口的大火只是时间早晚的事情。恢复生产需要一段时间。

original: Curses!
translation: 这是诅咒！

original: Skilled Diplomat
translation: 熟练外交官

original: One of our ambassadors has a preternatural ability for understanding the entangling alliances that surround us, and the implications of taking one wrong step or saying just the right words. How shall we use this great statesman?
translation: 我们的一位大使具有特别的处理周边纠缠不清的同盟的外交技巧，能够明白错误行为的影响，并能说出恰当的话。我们应当如何让他发挥他的才能？

original: Use him for the most delicate missions.
translation: 让他去从事最精细的工作。

original: Keep him at court to tell me secrets.
translation: 让他在宫廷中为我服务。

original: Our Cause Is Just
translation: 我们的理由正当

original: The hard work of our diplomatic team has convinced the world that our claims are fair, our actions are justified and our neighbors have little to fear from us. Anything we do, it is argued, is in the best interests of all.
translation: 我们的外交团队使得全世界相信我们的主张合理，行为合法，对邻国不会造成威胁。据称，我们所做的一切，都是为了各国人民的共同利益。

original: Come here, my pretties.
translation: 来吧，我的美人儿。

original: Popular Noble
translation: 受欢迎的贵族

original: One of our most gregarious nobles has returned from a tour where he regaled foreign courts with stories of our grandeur, not to mention spending handsomely out of his own pocket. Only a great land could create such a welcome guest.
translation: 我们的一位最受欢迎的贵族旅途归来，他向外国宫廷宣扬我们的伟大，更不要提他的挥金如土。只有一个伟大的国度才会有如此受欢迎的客人。

original: At least they are good for something.
translation: 至少他们还是有可取之处的。

original: Vassals Feel Safe
translation: 附庸感到安全

original: The strength of our armies and our generosity to their rights have made our vassals feel safe and protected under our umbrella. To ensure the security of this relationship, they have increased the tribute they are willing to pay us.
translation: 我们的军队强盛，我们对附庸权力的慷慨使得他们感到安全并依附于我们的庇护之下。为了加强关系，他们增加了对我们的贡品。

original: A shepherd shears his sheep; he does not slay them.
translation: 牧羊者剪羊毛，而非宰杀羊。

original: Fair Dealing
translation: 公平交易

original: An empire with colonies and vassals resembles a rowdy family, and it takes a firm but fair hand to keep everything in line. Recent policies have won the admiration of our subject nations and bring all of us closer together.
translation: 一个拥有殖民地与附庸的帝国如同一个吵闹的家庭，需要强硬的手段来使一切井井有条。近期的政策赢得了我们附庸国的钦佩并使得我们的关系更加紧密。

original: It was always for your own good.
translation: 我爱你们这群家伙。

original: A Firm Hand
translation: 强硬手段

original: The proper application of pressure and levers has enabled us to squeeze a little more out of our vassals. They may not like it, but they are the servants and we are the masters. They may have finally gotten the message - for now.
translation: 合理的施压与手段使我们能够从我们的附庸那里榨取更多。他们或许不喜欢，但我们是主他们是仆。我们或许最终会明白的—暂时的。

original: What's yours is mine.
translation: 你的就是我的。

original: The Pen Is Backed By The Sword
translation: 真理在大炮射程之内

original: The passports carried by our diplomats have come to represent the credibility and consistency of our national purpose. Secure in the knowledge that our ambassadors speak words backed with the full authority of our government, the emissaries are given smooth travel and fast horses to ensure their duties are performed with haste.
translation: 我们外交官所携带的证件代表了我们国家意志的可靠与稳定。我们外交官所说的话背后是我们政府的权威，顺利的旅途与快马确保使者的职责得到快速履行。

original: The respect is overdue.
translation: 尊重过时了。

original: Arrogant Administrators
translation: 狂妄的官员

original: The offices that deal with our subject nations have become so isolated from those that they govern that they have become arrogant - convinced that there is no point in listening to anyone not in the capital. The anger in the colonies and vassals has boiled over.
translation: 我们的那些处理附庸国事务的官员不了解附庸国实际，这令他们变得自大。他们认为首都以外的人的话不值得听。殖民地与附庸国间的愤怒蔓延。

original: Who do they think they are?
translation: 他们以为他们是谁？

original: Spy Ring Busted
translation: 间谍网瓦解

original: Some of our diplomats have been implicated in a major espionage operation. Now every ambassador or emissary we send is suspected of being a spy and is subject to the harshest examinations when they end their appointed missions. It will take time to restore our reputation.
translation: 我们的一些外交官涉嫌参与间谍行动。如今每一个我们派遣的外交官或者大使都会被怀疑为间谍并且当他们完成任务时遭到严厉的审查。我们需要时间来恢复我们的名声。

original: This is a disappointing lack of trust.
translation: 这是令人失望的不信任。

original: Impertinent Demands
translation: 粗鲁的要求

original: The pressures we put on our vassals may seem reasonable in the capital, but some demands are seen as insults by the petty crowns we have taken under our protection. Negotiation of terms will take a little longer than anticipated.
translation: 我们对于附庸的施压在首都人民看来很合理，但是这些要求在那些需要我们保护的弱小君主看起来是侮辱。对于条款的谈判可能需要比预期更长的时间。

original: We can wait.
translation: 我们可以等。

original: Hostile Rhetoric
translation: 敌意言论

original: One of our ambassadors made some unwise statements at a recent party. His angry and warlike denunciations of our neighbors mean that we are seen as a greater threat than we actually are.
translation: 我们的一位大使在最近的一次沙龙上做出了不明智的发言。他的愤怒与对于邻国的带有战争威胁的谴责使得我们的威胁被夸大。

original: Let them cower.
translation: 让他们颤抖吧。

original: We can smooth this over.
translation: 我们可以平息这件事。

original: Freethinkers Not Persecuted
translation: 停止对自由思想家的迫害

original: Our policy of letting philosophers, administrators and scientists pursue knowledge unfettered by government or religious stricture has led to a burst of activity in the salons and universities of our capital.
translation: 我们让哲学家，政客，科学家免于政府与宗教责难推广知识的政策使得我们首都的沙龙与大学非常活跃。

original: Brilliant!
translation: 明智之举！

original: Fair Laws Embraced By All
translation: 公认的公平法律

original: A commitment to true justice - blind to nation, religion or tradition - has proven popular with most portions of our population. Grievances against our rule are greatly reduced.
translation: 不分国家，民族，传统的对真正公平的承诺被证明受到多数人拥护。对我们统治的不满之声平息了很多。

original: The Law governs great and small.
translation: 法律面前，人人平等。

original: The Honest Broker
translation: 可靠的调停人

original: We are gaining an international reputation as a nation that will respect the interests of all its citizens and defend the rights of others. Our domestic fair dealing is paying off in our neighborhood.
translation: 我们作为一个维护全体国民利益，维护他国权利的国家而赢得国际声望。我们的公平行为在我们的邻国得到了回报。

original: They really like me!
translation: 他们真的喜欢我！

original: Cabinet Co-operation
translation: 内阁合作

original: Our humanist policies have reduced jealousy between our advisors, since they can no longer play on the religious and ethnic divisions within the country. Everyone is working for a state that they have faith in, and there is trust in the cabinet.
translation: 我们充满人文关怀的政策减少了顾问之间猜忌，因为他们再也不受种族和宗教不同的影响。每个人都为了他们信仰的国家工作，相信内阁的能力。

original: Sharing is caring.
translation: 分享关怀。

original: Acceptance of all is the road to progress
translation: 包容每个人是通向进步的道路

original: The petty divisions within our nation have long retarded our development. Since opening up administration to all talented citizens we have noticed great achievements in the development of local economies.
translation: 我们国内的细碎的分歧一直阻碍了我们的发展。当政府职位向所有有才华的公民开放后，我们发现了当地经济的巨大发展成就。

original: Tolerance may make us rich.
translation: 容忍使得我们富有。

original: A Soft Answer Turneth Away Wrath
translation: 温和的回答平息怒火

original: Our faith gives us peace and security, so we have no need to oppress others. Even those in the darkest depths of heretical beliefs can see how God encourages the respect of all humankind.
translation: 我们的信仰给予我们和平与安全感，所以我们不必压迫他人。即便是在最黑暗深渊中的异教徒也能看到上帝是如何鼓励尊重所有人的。

original: We shall be one nation.
translation: 我们是一个国家。

original: A Light Unto the World
translation: 世界灯塔

original: Our faith gives us peace and security, so we have no need to oppress others. Even those in the darkest depths of pagan beliefs can see how God encourages the respect of all humankind.
translation: 我们的信仰给予我们和平与安全感，所以我们不必压迫他人。即便是在最黑暗的深渊中的异教徒也能看到上帝是如何鼓励尊重所有人的。

original: We shall be one nation.
translation: 我们是一个国家。

original: The Reins Are Too Loose
translation: 缰绳过松

original: Efforts to treat our newly conquered enemies with respect for their liberties have only led to an outburst of 'patriotic' rabble rousers. This fire may burn out eventually, but we could try to squash it now.
translation: 尊重我们新征服敌人的自由的努力反而招致「爱国」的暴民怒火喷发。这火焰最终会燃尽，但是我们可以现在就熄灭它。

original: Let them rant.
translation: 让他们骂。

original: Send in the troops.
translation: 军队清场。

original: Freethinking Leads Away From God
translation: 自由思想使我们远离上帝

original: Tolerance for opinions is all well and good, but heretical preachers are risking the souls of their congregations. To make matters worse, attempting to suppress these deviants would go against our humanist ideals.
translation: 容忍不同意见是一件正确且有利的事情，但是异端依然在玩弄他们信徒的灵魂。我们可以以很小的代价压制他们，但是这违背了我们的人文主义思想。

original: It's hopefully harmless in the long run...
translation: 长远来看这没有害处。

original: Counter the heretical propaganda.
translation: 反击异端。

original: Ineffective Missionary Work
translation: 徒劳的传教士

original: An official commitment to humanism means that our missionaries are finding it difficult to persuade non-believers to fall in line. Without the stick of punishment or carrot of official preference, the preachers have to rely on only their personal charisma.
translation: 对人文主义的正式承诺将会导致传教士难以工作。没有来自官方的胡萝卜和大棒，牧师只能依靠他们自身的魅力。

original: Most unfortunate.
translation: 十分不幸。

original: We Fight the Past, It Fights Back
translation: 我们过去曾奋战，如今敌人又卷土重来

original: Dedication to a more liberal understanding of the place of the citizen in the state means that our neighbors have branded us a rogue nation, committed to undermining the traditional rights of crown, church and guild. Can we only trust those that think as we do?
translation: 国内公民对自由的理解，导致邻国将我们视为野蛮国家，他们认为我们决心毁灭王室，教会和行会的传统。能够想象我们会这么做吗？

original: Forward, even if alone.
translation: 虽千万人吾往矣。

original: Sermons for Princes
translation: 王室布道

original: The [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family is in our state churches' sermons and prayers, strengthening the public's opinion of them.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族在我们国家教会布道，祈祷，提升了公众对于他们的印象。

original: Act of Seclusion
translation: 隔离法案

original: The Statists have negotiated an act with a foreign power that will weaken Monarchists of [Root.GetName].
translation: 中央集权主义者已经和一个愿意削弱[Root.GetName]君主制支持者的外国势力协商。

original: Distrust Among the Nobles
translation: 贵族间的不信任

original: The administration's opposition to the House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] has caused some of the nation's military leaders to distrust the leadership.
translation: 政府机关对[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]王室的抵触使得一些军队将领对于领导者不信任。

original: Monarchists Unite Nobles Against Rival
translation: 君主主义者与贵族联合起来对抗共同的敌人

original: The Prince of [Root.GetName] has taken up leadership in the war against our hated rivals, rallying the nobles behind this noble cause.
translation: [Root.GetName]亲王在对抗我们宿敌的战争中接过了领导权，以这一崇高的事业团结了贵族。

original: Political Maxims of the [Root.GovernmentName]
translation: [Root.GovernmentName]的政治准则

original: One of the [Root.GetName]'s most respected advisors, $STATESMAN$$DIPLOMAT$$TRADER$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$, has recently published a work discussing the political principles the republican form of government depends on. While certainly well written and convincingly argued, some of the material is strongly critical of the hold the Princes of Orange has had on the office of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] recently. The advisor's loyalty to [Root.Monarch.GetName] may be less unwavering than we thought.
translation: [Root.GetName]的一位最受敬重的顾问，$STATESMAN$$DIPLOMAT$$TRADER$$COLONIALGOVERNOR$，最近出版了一本专著讨论共和国政府所要遵循的政治原则。尽管书本身质量很高，讨论非常有说服力，但书中的部分材料对奥兰治亲王最近获得 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 提出了严厉的批评，这位顾问对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的忠诚可能不像我们想的那样不可动摇。

original: One of the [Root.GetName]'s most respected advisors, $STATESMAN$$DIPLOMAT$$TRADER$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$, has recently published a work discussing the political principles the federal form of government depends on. While certainly well written and convincingly argued, some of the material is strongly critical of the hold the Princes of [Root.GetName] has had on the office of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] recently. The advisor's loyalty to [Root.Monarch.GetName] may be less unwavering than we thought.
translation: [Root.GetName]的一位最受敬重的顾问，$STATESMAN$$DIPLOMAT$$TRADER$$COLONIALGOVERNOR$，最近出版了一本专著讨论共和国政府所要遵循的政治原则。尽管书本身质量很高，讨论非常有说服力，但书中的部分材料对[Root.GetName]亲王最近获得 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 提出了严厉的批评，这位顾问对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的忠诚可能不像我们想的那样不可动摇。

original: Popular support for the House of Orange is strengthened from the pulpit of the [Root.Religion.GetName] church, where the common folk are often reminded of the great importance of a strong ruler for the state church and the tradition of hereditary rule.\n\n[Root.GetName], however, accommodates more than one faith. Those who adhere to other faiths don't always have kind words for the princes of Orange, with some using our republican ideals as an excuse to openly challenge the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the state church.
translation: 群众对于奥兰治皇室的支持由于 [Root.Religion.GetName]教堂的神职人员而加强,在教堂中群众经常被灌输一个强有力的统治者对于国教的重要性与世袭统治的传统。\n\n[Root.GetName]然而，国家容纳了不止一种信仰。那些持有不同信仰的人通常对奥兰治亲王不会有正面的评论，其中一些人利用我们国家的民主来公开攻击 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与国教。

original: Popular support for the House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] is strengthened from the pulpit of the [Root.Religion.GetName] church, where the common folk are often reminded of the great importance of a strong ruler for the state church and the tradition of hereditary rule.\n\n[Root.GetName], however, accommodates more than one faith. Those who adhere to other faiths don't always have kind words for the princes of [Root.GetName], with some using our republican ideals as an excuse to openly challenge the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the state church.
translation: 群众对于[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室的支持由于 [Root.Religion.GetName]教堂的神职人员而加强,在教堂中群众经常被灌输一个强有力的统治者对于国教的重要性与世袭统治的传统。\n\n[Root.GetName]然而，国家容纳了不止一种信仰。那些持有不同信仰的人通常对[Root.GetName]亲王不会有正面的评论，其中一些人利用我们国家的民主来公开攻击 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与国教。

original: The [Root.GovernmentName] and Free Trade
translation: [Root.GovernmentName]与自由贸易

original: What they demand is irrelevant. They are subjects of the [Root.GovernmentName] and must comply.
translation: 他们的要求毫不相干。他们是[Root.GovernmentName]国民因而必须顺从。

original: The King in [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的国王

original: The House of Orange has enjoyed increased support in [Root.GetName] lately. As a result, their proponents have grown bolder. Those within the church speak of the Princes of Orange in royal terms, comparing them to ancient biblical kings. Our people have not forgotten their role in securing our nation's sovereignty and being praised as the last in a line of saviors certainly benefits [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Nevertheless, calling [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] a king, even in the context of a sermon, risks weakening our republican institutions.
translation: 奥兰治家族最近在 [Root.GetName]受到了越来越多的支持。因此，他们的支持者明显增长了。教堂中的人以谈论皇家的形式来谈起奥兰治亲王，将他们比作古代圣经中的贤王。我们的人民没有忘记他们在拯救我们国家主权中扮演的角色，并且被作为最后的救世主称赞毫无疑问有益于 [Root.Monarch.GetName]。然而，称呼 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]为国王，即使在舆论宣传的背景下，也冒着削弱我们共和政体的风险。

original: The House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] has enjoyed increased support in [Root.GetName] lately. As a result, their proponents have grown bolder. Those within the church speak of the Princes of [Root.GetName] in royal terms, comparing them to ancient biblical kings. Our people have not forgotten their role in securing our nation's sovereignty and being praised as the last in a line of saviors certainly benefits [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Nevertheless, calling [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] a king, even in the context of a sermon, risks weakening our federal institutions.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族最近在 [Root.GetName]受到了越来越多的支持。因此，他们的支持者明显增长了。教堂中的人以谈论皇家的形式来谈起[Root.GetName]亲王，将他们比作古代圣经中的贤王。我们的人民没有忘记他们在拯救我们国家主权中扮演的角色，并且被作为最后的救世主称赞毫无疑问有益于 [Root.Monarch.GetName]。然而，称呼 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]为国王，即使在舆论宣传的背景下，也冒着削弱我们共和政体的风险。

original: Although still maintaining a hold on the position of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the rule over [Root.GetName], the influence of the Orangists has fallen slightly in recent times. Nobles who sought power by aligning themselves with the family are increasingly coming to view this as a sign that the House of Orange, despite its legacy, is still at the mercy of the bureaucracy and political environment of the republic.\n\nSome of those who have formed the backbone of our armed forces are requesting that [Root.Monarch.GetName] commits to asserting power more clearly in military matters. None of their suggestions contribute to very constructive purposes, but may impress the old guard.
translation: 尽管仍然把持着 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的位子并且统治 [Root.GetName]，奥兰治党的影响力在最近开始轻微地衰弱。那些通过家族结盟来获取权力的贵族，越来越多的把这看做奥兰治皇室尽管有很多功绩仍然受制于共和国的官僚制度和政治环境的表现。\n\n我们军队中的一些骨干人员要求 [Root.Monarch.GetName]在军事事务中更加明确的展示力量。他们的建议没有起到建设性作用，但会给保守者留下印象。

original: Although still maintaining a hold on the position of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the rule over [Root.GetName], the influence of the Monarchists has fallen slightly in recent times. Nobles who sought power by aligning themselves with the family are increasingly coming to view this as a sign that the House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName], despite its legacy, is still at the mercy of the bureaucracy and political environment of the republic.\n\nSome of those who have formed the backbone of our armed forces are requesting that [Root.Monarch.GetName] commits to asserting power more clearly in military matters. None of their suggestions contribute to very constructive purposes, but may impress the old guard.
translation: 尽管仍然把持着 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的位子并且统治 [Root.GetName]，君主党的影响力在最近开始轻微地衰弱。那些通过家族结盟来获取权力的贵族，越来越多的把这看做[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族尽管有很多功绩仍然受制于共和国的官僚制度和政治环境的表现。\n\n我们军队中的一些骨干人员要求 [Root.Monarch.GetName]在军事事务中更加明确的展示力量。他们的建议没有起到建设性作用，但会给保守者留下印象。

original: Despite the monopoly the Orange family holds on the office of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.GetName] has seen a current of republican ideals recently. Statists have viewed this as a sign that our nation may very well be on its way towards their goal of a full-fledged republic, with some even going as far as praising the Prince of Orange for permitting this shift. Regardless of how much truth there is to this, our recent political maneuvering keeps the dream of the Dutch Republic alive.
translation: 尽管奥兰治王室垄断了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的政权，[Root.GetName]最近见证了共和思潮。集权者将此视为一个信号，我们国家极有可能向着他们所期望的制度完善的共和国方向发展。其中一些人甚至因为奥兰治亲王支持这种改变而称赞他。无论其真实性多大，我们最近的政治操作一直为保持荷兰共和国生机而努力。

original: Despite the monopoly the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family holds on the office of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.GetName] has seen a current of republican ideals recently. Statists have viewed this as a sign that our nation may very well be on its way towards their goal of a full-fledged republic, with some even going as far as praising the Prince of [Root.GetName] for permitting this shift. Regardless of how much truth there is to this, our recent political maneuvering keeps the dream of the [Root.GovernmentName] alive.
translation: 尽管[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族垄断了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的政权，[Root.GetName]最近见证了共和思潮。集权者将此视为一个信号，我们国家极有可能向着他们所期望的制度完善的共和国方向发展。其中一些人甚至因为[Root.GetName]亲王支持这种改变而称赞他。无论其真实性多大，我们最近的政治操作一直为保持[Root.GovernmentName]生机而努力。

original: The Orangists already wield great influence over the [Root.GetAdjective] rule, and the latest developments in the political arena have only served to strengthen their grip on our supposed republic. Some of our previously loyal subjects have taken this as a sign that the priorities of [Root.GetName] have shifted and that a time is coming when tax money will be wasted on vain pursuits of noble families. Down this road, they claim, lie only petty wars and tyranny. In protest, many people are refusing to pay taxes to support this government.
translation: 奥兰治党已经施加了巨大的影响力于 [Root.GetAdjective]的统治，并且政治领域的最新发展仅仅被用于加强他们对于所谓共和国的掌控。我们当中一些曾经忠诚的国民已经将此视为一个 [Root.GetName]的优先事项已经开始变化的信号，并且税赋将被浪费在贵族家庭无谓的追求上的时代即将到来。他们认为长久以往只会有无尽的冲突与暴政。许多人通过拒绝向这个政府缴税来抗议。

original: The Monarchists already wield great influence over the [Root.GetAdjective] rule, and the latest developments in the political arena have only served to strengthen their grip on our state. Some of our previously loyal subjects have taken this as a sign that the priorities of [Root.GetName] have shifted and that a time is coming when tax money will be wasted on vain pursuits of noble families. Down this road, they claim, lie only petty wars and tyranny. In protest, many people are refusing to pay taxes to support this government.
translation: 君主党已经施加了巨大的影响力于 [Root.GetAdjective]的统治，并且政治领域的最新发展仅仅被用于加强他们对于所谓共和国的掌控。我们当中一些曾经忠诚的国民已经将此视为一个 [Root.GetName]的优先事项已经开始变化的信号，并且税赋将被浪费在贵族家庭无谓的追求上的时代即将到来。他们认为长久以往只会有无尽的冲突与暴政。许多人通过拒绝向这个政府缴税来抗议。

original: The reign of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is all but absolute. The Princes of Orange have secured power over [Root.GetName] for a long time ahead. Everything points to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] ruling for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] entire life.\n\n$SPYMASTER$, one of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] closest advisors, agrees with this assessment. This is a person fiercely loyal to their country, so loyal, in fact, that they would personally take the life of anyone who threatens the republic. In a recent meeting with a few carefully selected people, $SPYMASTER$ let it be known that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]self and the Orangists' stranglehold on the rulership is perhaps the biggest threat of all. $SPYMASTER$ can assure that the lifetime rule will be a short one.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]已经建立了决定的统治。在这之前奥兰治亲王们对[Root.GetName]的统治已经持续很久，所有迹象都表明[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的统治将维持终生。\n\n$SPYMASTER$，一位 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的密友赞同这个判断。他是一位对国家如此忠诚，以至于如果发现对共和国有威胁的人存在，会毫不犹豫的取他性命的人。最近一次只有少部分人参加的密会中，$SPYMASTER$告知大家[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]本人以及奥兰治党对权力的把持或许是对共和体制的最大威胁。$SPYMASTER$宣称的终生执政将不会长久。

original: The reign of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is all but absolute. The Princes have secured power over [Root.GetName] for a long time ahead. Everything points to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] ruling for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] entire life.\n\n$SPYMASTER$, one of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] closest advisors, agrees with this assessment. This is a person fiercely loyal to their country, so loyal, in fact, that they would personally take the life of anyone who threatens the state. In a recent meeting with a few carefully selected people, $SPYMASTER$ let it be known that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]self and the Orangists' stranglehold on the rulership is perhaps the biggest threat of all. $SPYMASTER$ can assure that the lifetime rule will be a short one.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]已经建立了决定的统治。在这之前亲王们对[Root.GetName]的统治已经持续很久，所有迹象都表明[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的统治将维持终生。\n\n$SPYMASTER$，一位 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的密友赞同这个判断。他是一位对国家如此忠诚，以至于如果发现对共和国有威胁的人存在，会毫不犹豫的取他性命的人。最近一次只有少部分人参加的密会中，$SPYMASTER$告知大家[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]本人以及奥兰治党对权力的把持或许是对共和体制的最大威胁。$SPYMASTER$宣称的终生执政将不会长久。

original: The Princes of Orange command almost unquestioned loyalty. Free elections seem to be a thing of the past, despite our nation calling itself a republic. The Statists are no longer the only ones who question the integrity of republican institutions in [Root.GetName]; rather, it's growing increasingly uncommon to refer to these concepts at all. However noble the goals of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], the underpinnings of our government form are slipping away.
translation: 奥兰治亲王要求毫无疑问的忠诚。自由选举已成往事，尽管我们国家自诩为共和国。不仅是集权者在质疑 [Root.GetName]共和制度的完整性;这些思想越来越少地被提及。无论我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]理想多么崇高，我们政府的基石已然消失。

original: The Princes of [Root.GetName] command almost unquestioned loyalty. Free elections seem to be a thing of the past, despite our nation featuring concepts akin to a republic. The Statists are no longer the only ones who question the integrity of republican institutions in [Root.GetName]; rather, it's growing increasingly uncommon to refer to these concepts at all. However noble the goals of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], the underpinnings of our government form are slipping away.
translation: [Root.GetName]亲王要求毫无疑问的忠诚。自由选举已成往事，尽管我们国家自诩为共和国。不仅是集权者在质疑 [Root.GetName]共和制度的完整性;这些思想越来越少地被提及。无论我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]理想多么崇高，我们政府的基石已然消失。

original: [Root.GetName] may be a republic, but we still maintain enough power through blood for marriage ties to be a factor in our relationship with other nations. Even so, the more fluid the rulership, the less tangible these ties become.\n\nNations who are normally pleased with the Statist administration now worry about the prospect that their ties to the [Root.GetAdjective] powers may be weakening as the nation leaves its hereditary traditions behind. They want to make sure influential families retain some power... including the Orange family.
translation: [Root.GetName]或许是共和国，但我们仍然通过联姻的血缘关系在与其他国家的关系上保持了足够的力量。即便如此，当权者的统治越不稳定，这些关系就越脆弱。\n\n那些更加支持中央集权统治者的国家现在担心与[Root.GetAdjective]联姻的力量会因为我们国家的世袭传统被废弃。他们希望确保具有影响力的家族保留一些权力……包括奥兰治家族。

original: [Root.GetName] may be a federal union, but we still maintain enough power through blood for marriage ties to be a factor in our relationship with other nations. Even so, the more fluid the rulership, the less tangible these ties become.\n\nNations who are normally pleased with the Statist administration now worry about the prospect that their ties to the [Root.GetAdjective] powers may be weakening as the nation leaves its hereditary traditions behind. They want to make sure influential families retain some power... including the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family.
translation: [Root.GetName]或许是共和国，但我们仍然通过联姻的血缘关系在与其他国家的关系上保持了足够的力量。即便如此，当权者的统治越不稳定，这些关系就越脆弱。\n\n那些更加支持中央集权统治者的国家现在担心与[Root.GetAdjective]联姻的力量会因为我们国家的世袭传统被废弃。他们希望确保具有影响力的家族保留一些权力……包括[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族。

original: Nobility Ties in the Army
translation: 陆军中的贵族团体

original: The Statist rulers have succeeded in making institutions of [Root.GetName] increasingly representative, but one institution that has resisted recent changes is the army. One of our generals belongs to a family of nobles who have strong ties to the House of Orange and has been sabotaging our efforts to oust the Orange loyalists from high-ranking military positions.\n\nNow, he's gone even further and wants one of his relatives, also an Orangist, to act as advisor to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. While this young person seems like a talented commandant, we would loathe giving them influence.
translation: 爱国派成功地使[Root.GetName]的政府机构体系更加共和化，但是有一个机构对改革非常抗拒，那就是军队。和奥兰治家族十分亲密的一位将军破坏了我们试图架空忠于奥兰治家族的高阶将领的努力。\n\n现在，他甚至更进一步，想要他的一位亲戚，同样也是奥兰治派的人，成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的顾问。虽然这个年轻人看起来是个有才华的指挥官，我们不会乐见他取得影响力。

original: The Statist rulers have succeeded in making institutions of [Root.GetName] increasingly representative, but one institution that has resisted recent changes is the army. One of our generals belongs to a family of nobles who have strong ties to the House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] and has been sabotaging our efforts to oust the [Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] loyalists from high-ranking military positions.\n\nNow, he's gone even further and wants one of his relatives, also a Monarchist, to act as advisor to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. While this young person seems like a talented commandant, we would loathe giving them influence.
translation: 爱国派成功地使[Root.GetName]的政府机构体系更加共和化，但是有一个机构对改革非常抗拒，那就是军队。和[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族十分亲密的一位将军破坏了我们试图架空忠于[Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的高阶将领的努力。\n\n现在，他甚至更进一步，想要他的一位亲戚，同样也是君主派的人，成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的顾问。虽然这个年轻人看起来是个有才华的指挥官，我们不会乐见他取得影响力。

original: Nobles Look to the Prince of [Root.GetName]
translation: 贵族盼望[Root.GetName]亲王掌权

original: Belief in the virtue of hereditary power tends to be strong among those who have themselves inherited their power. Local nobles in [Root.GetName] don't see that connection and argue that their wish to see the House of Orange in power is grounded in their concern for national unity and stability.\n\nGoverning those who don't believe in what we are trying to achieve is not easy. Sometimes direct conflict cannot be avoided. Sometimes it can be avoided, but at a price.
translation: 继承者愈加笃信继承的优点。 [Root.GetName]的当地贵族并未察觉这种联系并声称他们希望奥兰治家族掌权是为了国家的团结和稳定。\n\n统治那些不认同我们观点的人并非易事。有时，直接冲突无法避免。有时则可以避免，但需要付出代价。

original: Belief in the virtue of hereditary power tends to be strong among those who have themselves inherited their power. Local nobles in [Root.GetName] don't see that connection and argue that their wish to see the House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] in power is grounded in their concern for national unity and stability.\n\nGoverning those who don't believe in what we are trying to achieve is not easy. Sometimes direct conflict cannot be avoided. Sometimes it can be avoided, but at a price.
translation: 继承者愈加笃信继承的优点。 [Root.GetName]的当地贵族并未察觉这种联系并声称他们希望[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族掌权是为了国家的团结和稳定。\n\n统治那些不认同我们观点的人并非易事。有时，直接冲突无法避免。有时则可以避免，但需要付出代价。

original: They are subjects of the [Root.GetName] like everyone else!
translation: 他们都是 [Root.GetName]和其他人一样都是[Root.GetName]的人!

original: Successes of the [Root.GovernmentName]
translation: [Root.GovernmentName]的成功

original: The recent increase in support for the Orangist faction has sparked a discussion about how our republic is viewed by other nations. A country with a weak monarch may be regarded as easy prey and unworthy of respect. What does this mean for a country lacking a monarch altogether?\n\nThe Orangists claim to have the answer. For our nation to be a contender on the international arena, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] must show [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ability to unite and rule. Vain power displays are normally considered a waste, but perhaps one would be necessary now.
translation: 最近对奥兰治党支持的增长点燃了对于其他国家如何看待我们的争论。一个有着软弱君主的国度会被视为猎物并且不值得尊重。这对于一个没有君主的国家意味着什么？\n\n奥兰治党宣称他们有答案。为了让我们国家成为国际社会上的强大竞争者， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]必须显示出 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的能力来团结，统治。无用的炫耀力量被视为浪费，但现在看来一次展示武力是必须的。

original: The recent increase in support for the Monarchists faction has sparked a discussion about how our [Root.GovernmentName] is viewed by other nations. A country with a weak monarch may be regarded as easy prey and unworthy of respect. What does this mean for a country lacking a monarch altogether?\n\nThe Monarchists claim to have the answer. For our nation to be a contender on the international arena, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] must show [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ability to unite and rule. Vain power displays are normally considered a waste, but perhaps one would be necessary now.
translation: 最近对君主党支持的增长点燃了对于其他国家如何看待我们的[Root.GovernmentName]的争论。一个有着软弱君主的国度会被视为猎物并且不值得尊重。这对于一个没有君主的国家意味着什么？\n\n奥兰治党宣称他们有答案。为了让我们国家成为国际社会上的强大竞争者， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]必须显示出 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的能力来团结，统治。无用的炫耀力量被视为浪费，但现在看来一次展示武力是必须的。

original: The [Root.GetAdjectiveCap] Road to Glory
translation: 向荣耀进军的[Root.GetAdjectiveCap]

original: The victory of the opposition in the latest struggles between Statist and Orangist interests has turned out to unexpectedly benefit [Root.GetName]. Nobles who had taken modest interest in military matters before are now hoping for a future where a Prince of Orange can lead our people to glory. They see a bright and proud future for the [Root.GetAdjective] republic, and whether or not they are right, this will benefit our military with much-needed leadership.
translation: 在最近的奥兰治党与集权者冲突中敌方的胜利，出乎意料的使得 [Root.GetName]受益。那些军中的贵族期待着奥兰治亲王引导我们的人民走向辉煌。他们看到了 [Root.GetAdjective]共和国光明，荣耀的未来，无论这种看法是否正确，这会使得我们急需将领的军队受益。

original: The victory of the opposition in the latest struggles between Statist and Monarchists interests has turned out to unexpectedly benefit [Root.GetName]. Nobles who had taken modest interest in military matters before are now hoping for a future where a Prince of [Root.GetName] can lead our people to glory. They see a bright and proud future for the [Root.GetAdjective] republic, and whether or not they are right, this will benefit our military with much-needed leadership.
translation: 在最近的君主党与集权者冲突中敌方的胜利，出乎意料的使得 [Root.GetName]受益。那些军中的贵族期待着[Root.GetName]亲王引导我们的人民走向辉煌。他们看到了 [Root.GetAdjective]共和国光明，荣耀的未来，无论这种看法是否正确，这会使得我们急需将领的军队受益。

original: Direct the supporters to the army.
translation: 让支持者加入陆军

original: Direct the supporters to the navy.
translation: 让支持者加入海军

original: Republican rule is frequently about compromise, finding a middle ground so a decision can be made. Sometimes, it isn't. In the last conflict between Orangist and Statist interests, when the administration came out victorious, some nobles saw this as a sign that the republican rulers have grown unreasonable and presumptuous.\n\nMorale among the soldiers in our nation may remain high, but some generals are losing faith in the [Root.GetAdjective] cause. Wrong as they might be, our military strength will suffer from their lacking leadership.
translation: 共和统治意味着频繁的妥协，寻找中间立场来使得决议通过。有时则不然。在最近的奥兰治党和集权者的冲突中，当执政官凯旋时，有些贵族将此看做共和统治变得不合理，专横的标志。\n\n我国士兵的士气或许会保持高涨，但有些将领对 [Root.GetAdjective]的事业正在失去信心。他们或许是错的，但我们的军事力量会因此削弱。

original: Federal rule is frequently about compromise, finding a middle ground so a decision can be made. Sometimes, it isn't. In the last conflict between Monarchists and Statist interests, when the administration came out victorious, some nobles saw this as a sign that the republican rulers have grown unreasonable and presumptuous.\n\nMorale among the soldiers in our nation may remain high, but some generals are losing faith in the [Root.GetAdjective] cause. Wrong as they might be, our military strength will suffer from their lacking leadership.
translation: 联邦统治意味着频繁的妥协，寻找中间立场来使得决议通过。有时则不然。在最近的君主党和集权者的冲突中，当执政官凯旋时，有些贵族将此看做共和统治变得不合理，专横的标志。\n\n我国士兵的士气或许会保持高涨，但有些将领对 [Root.GetAdjective]的事业正在失去信心。他们或许是错的，但我们的军事力量会因此削弱。

original: $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$ is a person of action. That is why they were employed by the administration and how they have continued to hold the position as [Root.GetName]'s chief military advisor despite being a well-known supporter of the Orangist cause. Now, their actions have turned against us.\n\nClaiming that unquestioned strength of the Statists is ruining [Root.GetName], $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$ has rallied others who find their power threatened by the ruling faction behind them and now attempts to stage a coup and take power. Now it is up to us to take action or to let this happen.
translation: $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$是一个行动派的人，这也是为什么他被当局所雇佣，而且尽管他是一个著名的奥兰治派，他却能长期把持[Root.GetName]的首席军事顾问的位置。不过现在，他开始反对我们了。\n\n他声称爱国派的举动正在摧毁[Root.GetName]，$ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$把感受到权力受到威胁的人们团结起来，准备发起政变来夺权。现在是阻止他们的时候了。

original: $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$ is a person of action. That is why they were employed by the administration and how they have continued to hold the position as [Root.GetName]'s chief military advisor despite being a well-known supporter of the Monarchists cause. Now, their actions have turned against us.\n\nClaiming that unquestioned strength of the Statists is ruining [Root.GetName], $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$ has rallied others who find their power threatened by the ruling faction behind them and now attempts to stage a coup and take power. Now it is up to us to take action or to let this happen.
translation: $ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$是一个行动派的人，这也是为什么他被当局所雇佣，而且尽管他是一个著名的君主派，他却能长期把持[Root.GetName]的首席军事顾问的位置。不过现在，他开始反对我们了。\n\n他声称爱国派的举动正在摧毁[Root.GetName]，$ARMY_ORGANISER$$COMMANDANT$$QUARTERMASTER$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$RECRUITMASTER$把感受到权力受到威胁的人们团结起来，准备发起政变来夺权。现在是阻止他们的时候了。

original: For the Kingdom!
translation: 为了王国！

original: For the Union!
translation: 为了联盟！

original: Is the [Root.GovernmentName] descending into anarchy?
translation: [Root.GovernmentName]陷入无政府状态？

original: We are at war, but not just any war. Our enemy is not only one of current circumstance, but a hated rival of [Root.GetName]. At times such as this, the provinces are united against a common threat, and nobles are eager to lead them into battle. Who better to lead than the Prince of Orange?\n\nWhile allowing the Orange family to rally other nobles and the common people to war would strengthen combat morale, the Statist are not fools. They know that the effects of this unity will linger beyond the war and that Orangists will be reluctant to let go of any power they are granted, even for the best of causes.
translation: 我们在战争之中，但不仅仅是一场战争。我们的敌人不仅仅是敌人，而是 [Root.GetName]的宿敌。在这样的时候，所有省份团结起来，同仇敌忾，贵族渴望领军建功立业。谁比奥兰治亲王更擅长领兵？\n\n尽管允许奥兰治团结其他贵族和群众来加入战争会鼓舞士气，但集权者不是傻瓜。他们知道这种团结会在战争后依然持续并且奥兰治党不愿让出他们被给与的任何权力，即使是有最好的理由。

original: We are at war, but not just any war. Our enemy is not only one of current circumstance, but a hated rival of [Root.GetName]. At times such as this, the provinces are united against a common threat, and nobles are eager to lead them into battle. Who better to lead than the Prince of [Root.GetName]?\n\nWhile allowing the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family to rally other nobles and the common people to war would strengthen combat morale, the Statist are not fools. They know that the effects of this unity will linger beyond the war and that Monarchists will be reluctant to let go of any power they are granted, even for the best of causes.
translation: 我们在战争之中，但不仅仅是一场战争。我们的敌人不仅仅是敌人，而是 [Root.GetName]的宿敌。在这样的时候，所有省份团结起来，同仇敌忾，贵族渴望领军建功立业。谁比[Root.GetName]亲王更擅长领兵？\n\n尽管允许[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族团结其他贵族和群众来加入战争会鼓舞士气，但集权者不是傻瓜。他们知道这种团结会在战争后依然持续并且奥兰治党不愿让出他们被给与的任何权力，即使是有最好的理由。

original: The House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] has led our nation to victory before.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族曾经领导我们国家走向胜利。

original: The war is over, greatly aided by the efforts of the Orangists, who are still enjoying popular support from these actions and retaining much of the power granted to them. Statists who were willing to make concessions to the family during wartime are now demanding a return to how things were before the war. Anything less, they argue, would be tantamount to giving control over the country to whoever leads it into battle, throwing away the representative institutions the republic is so proud of.
translation: 战争结束，奥兰治党的帮助起了很大的作用，他们仍然通过这些行为享有广泛的支持并且保持了他们被许诺的权力。集权者在战争时期对家族做出了让步，现在要求一切回复到战前的样子。他们宣称，这样做相当于将国家交给在战争中领导她的人，将共和国引以为荣的议会抛之不顾。

original: The war is over, greatly aided by the efforts of the Monarchists, who are still enjoying popular support from these actions and retaining much of the power granted to them. Statists who were willing to make concessions to the family during wartime are now demanding a return to how things were before the war. Anything less, they argue, would be tantamount to giving control over the country to whoever leads it into battle, throwing away the representative institutions the federation is so proud of.
translation: 战争结束，君主党的帮助起了很大的作用，他们仍然通过这些行为享有广泛的支持并且保持了他们被许诺的权力。集权者在战争时期对家族做出了让步，现在要求一切回复到战前的样子。他们宣称，这样做相当于将国家交给在战争中领导她的人，将共和国引以为荣的议会抛之不顾。

original: Rebuilding the [Root.GovernmentName]
translation: 重建[Root.GovernmentName]

original: Let us rebuild these ideals, for the people of [Root.GetName].
translation: 让我们恢复这些想法，为了 [Root.GetName]的国民。

original: The Prince of [Root.GetName] could lead us to victory in the future.
translation: [Root.GetName]亲王在未来会引导我们走向胜利。

original: Interest of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的利息

original: Some of our nation's frontiers are looking across the border with pride or ambitions of conquest. Others with fear. Bordering a nation which may threaten our sovereignty has led some influential local leaders to support Statist agendas in the republic, hoping to avoid a Prince leading the nation who may seek to expand the [Root.GetAdjective] borders and cause unnecessary conflict with our stronger neighbor.
translation: 我们国家的一部分边境居民正在怀抱着荣耀与征服的野心远眺边境。其他人则怀抱恐惧。与一个会威胁我们国家主权的国家接壤使得一些具有影响力的士绅在共和国议事中支持集权者，希望避免寻求扩张 [Root.GetAdjective]边界并与我们强大的邻居发生不必要冲突的亲王当权。

original: Being a border province does not seem to be a cause for concern among the nobles of [Root.GetName]. Conversely, they believe that our neighbors should be the ones to be concerned, as we might very well decide that their lands would be better off under the rule of [Root.GetName] or as Generality Lands of the republic. The people across the border seem to have seen this coming, since they appear to fear the might of [Root.Owner.GetName], particularly with an ambitious Prince of Orange in power.
translation: [Root.GetName]的贵族并不因为在边界省份而担心。相反，他们相信我们的邻国才应当担心，因为我们认为他们的土地如果在 [Root.GetName]统治下或者成为共和国的领土会更好。国境上的人们看起来将要见证这一刻的到来，因为他们显示出了对于 [Root.Owner.GetName]力量的恐惧，尤其是一位野心勃勃的奥兰治亲王在执政。

original: Being a border province does not seem to be a cause for concern among the nobles of [Root.GetName]. Conversely, they believe that our neighbors should be the ones to be concerned, as we might very well decide that their lands would be better off under the rule of [Root.GetName] or as Generality Lands of the Union. The people across the border seem to have seen this coming, since they appear to fear the might of [Root.Owner.GetName], particularly with an ambitious Prince of [Root.GetName] in power.
translation: [Root.GetName]的贵族并不因为在边界省份而担心。相反，他们相信我们的邻国才应当担心，因为我们认为他们的土地如果在 [Root.GetName]统治下或者成为共和国的领土会更好。国境上的人们看起来将要见证这一刻的到来，因为他们显示出了对于 [Root.Owner.GetName]力量的恐惧，尤其是一位野心勃勃的[Root.GetName]亲王在执政。

original: Having to share a border with a nation we have declared open rivalry and hostility against could lead people to be contemptuous, but the good citizens of [Root.GetCapitalName] have managed to hide their contempt well.\n\nInstead, the local nobles have secretly started to draft plans of expansion into the lands of our enemy, plans that they believe might be put into action if [Root.Owner.GetName] would only have a leader who thought of the nation's glory first and political games second. They have little respect for the efforts of republicans, but believe that the Prince might support their ambitions.
translation: 人们蔑视一个与我们相邻被认为是宿敌并作出敌意行为的国家，但是 [Root.GetCapitalName]的优秀公民能够很好的掩饰他们的轻蔑。\n\n相反，当地贵族已经秘密的开始策划入侵我们敌人，如果 [Root.Owner.GetName]只有一个优先考虑国家荣耀而把政治手段放在其次的领导人，计划就会实施。他们对共和毫无尊重，却认为亲王会支持他们的野心。

original: [Root.GetName] is one of the central provinces forming the backbone of our republic, and their representatives' opinions are valued in the States-General. Recent developments in [Root.GetCapitalName] have favored the opposition, leading to questions on which local faction we should seek to support. An upcoming debate could give us a chance to turn the tide, but the opposition may not take kindly to us putting a stop to their gains.
translation: [Root.GetName]是我们国家核心的中心省份，他们的代表在议会中有着很大的话语权。[Root.GetCapitalName]最近的发展对反对派有利，这引出了我们应该支持哪一方地方势力的问题。一个将要到来的讨论会给我们一次扭转局势的机会，但如果我们损害了反对派利益，他们不会给我们好脸色。

original: [Root.GetName] is one of the central provinces forming the backbone of our Union, and their representatives' opinions are valued in the States-General. Recent developments in [Root.GetCapitalName] have favored the opposition, leading to questions on which local faction we should seek to support. An upcoming debate could give us a chance to turn the tide, but the opposition may not take kindly to us putting a stop to their gains.
translation: [Root.GetName]是我们联盟核心的中心省份，他们的代表在议会中有着很大的话语权。[Root.GetCapitalName]最近的发展对反对派有利，这引出了我们应该支持哪一方地方势力的问题。一个将要到来的讨论会给我们一次扭转局势的机会，但如果我们损害了反对派利益，他们不会给我们好脸色。

original: Send someone to argue in favor of Monarchists.
translation: 派遣一个支持君主主义的人去争论。
